Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 31st overall pick, by Houston in 2017...
Injured on 6/26/2018 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 9/7/2018, off Donald Craver (SLB)...
Injured on 7/23/2019 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 3 days...
Injured on 6/28/2020 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for 5 days...
Traded from Houston to Chicago on 2/24/2021 (Going to CHI: SS Luis Ramos. Going to HOU: 3B Cordell Macaulay, 2B Amadeo Hidalgo)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/21/2021, off Rodney Hammes (SEA)...
Injured on 4/30/2021 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 7 weeks...
Was claimed off waivers by Seattle on 6/26/2021.
